title: One Piece Episode 172 - The Ordeal of the Swamp! Chopper vs. Sky Punk Gedatsu!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of Episode 172 on Crunchyroll. Chopper unleashes the fury of his Rumble Ball during a sticky slugfest with a swamp cloud spewing priest of Upper Yard.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Episode contains only content up to episode 172

title: One Piece: Skypiea Arc - Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers
description: Comprehensive analysis of the Skypiea arc including discussion of the priests' ordeals and Chopper's battle with Gedatsu. Notes how this arc represents character growth for Chopper.
